Sentence.value: Sitting down in a chair and getting up again with crutches can be tricky until your child learns how to do it.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Sitting down in a [[chair|C1524106]] and getting up again with [[crutches|C0010397]] can be tricky until your child learns how to do it.

Sentence.value: - Hold the crutches at the side and use the other hand to hold the arm of the chair.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Hold the crutches at the side and use the other hand to hold the [[arm|C1140618]] of the [[chair|C1524106]].

Sentence.value: - Push up on the handgrip of the crutch and the arm of the chair.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Push up on the handgrip of the crutch and the [[arm|C1140618]] of the [[chair|C1524106]].
